body:
This is the First Episode of my Random Kohi 1v1s series. Read description for all info. I wasn't 100% trying on this one, but I will in the future. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eKvWd38eN0g 

CHALLENGE: Spot Lyyris in Chat. 

P.S: It's fun w mashing to scare people xD
